filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 英國脫歐相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 Brexit.json

chunks.chunk_text: 想知道薪水入帳後該如何管理投資新手又該何時入場出國旅遊怎麼玩追什麼我是蔡尚樺邀請您來收聽玉山銀行全新Podcast玉山學堂在這裡我將和不同世代的來賓一起聊投資談消費分享最實用的理財觀念讓理財不只是數字而是更輕鬆更有趣的生活方式現在就點擊連結收聽一起開啟幸福人生
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 英國脫歐相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 Brexit.json

chunks.chunk_text: Hello 同情家族歡迎收聽Look Back Sunday在這個節目John老師會彙整過去不同國家與主題的熱門跟讀文章讓你可以在15分鐘內吸收最精華的世界時事趣聞Let's get right to it
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 英國脫歐相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 Brexit.json

chunks.chunk_text: The sudden burst of doomsaying in Britain is rooted at least as much in psychology as economics
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 英國脫歐相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 Brexit.json

chunks.chunk_text: It's a combination of things that could, in principle, lead to that, but are quite survivable on their own, said Jonathan Ports, a professor of economics at King's College LondonWe always talk about the 1970s, but it's half a century later, and all sorts of things are different
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 英國脫歐相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 Brexit.json

chunks.chunk_text: He noted has bounced back faster from the pandemic than many experts predictedThe shortages in labor and some goods are likely a transitory effect of reopening much of the economy after prolonged lockdownsRising wages and supply bottlenecks are driving up the inflation rateWhile the fuel shortages that have closed dozens of gas stationsreflect a shortage of truck drivers, not of energy supplies
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 英國脫歐相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 Brexit.json

chunks.chunk_text: Nor does Britain have the aging industrial base and powerful unions it had in the 1970sLabor unrest led to crippling strikes that brought down a conservative prime minister, Edward Heath, and one of his Labour Party successors, James Kelligan, after what the tabloids called the winter of discontent in 1979And yet the parallels are suggestive enough
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 英國脫歐相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 Brexit.json

chunks.chunk_text: That is a very easy ghost to resurrect,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 英國脫歐相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 Brexit.json

chunks.chunk_text: but these are real problemsYou can just see this perfect storm comingBrexit done at lastNow for the hard partThe United Kingdom left the EU on Friday, its most significant change of course since the last of its empire, and a major blow to 70 years of effort to forge European unity from the ruins of two world wars
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 英國脫歐相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 Brexit.json

chunks.chunk_text: After the numerous twists and turns of a three and a half year crisis, the final parting is an anticlimax of sortsBritain steps into the twilight zone of a transition period that preserves membership in all but name until the end of this yearAt a stroke, the EU will lose 15% of its economy, its biggest military spender, and the world's international financial capital, London
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 英國脫歐相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 Brexit.json

chunks.chunk_text: This is the moment when the dawn breaks and the curtain goes up on a new act, said UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson, one of the leaders of the leave campaign in the 2016 referendumIt is a moment of real national renewal and change
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 英國脫歐相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 Brexit.json

chunks.chunk_text: that will be the mark of future Peace in Brussels, while Britain's either side of the Brexit, a portmanteau of Britain and exit, divide expressed either sadness or delightFor proponents, Brexit is Independence Day, an escape from what they cast as a doomedGerman dominated project that is failing its 500 million people
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 英國脫歐相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 Brexit.json

chunks.chunk_text: 奪取它的經濟,最終導致在東南亞地區的更為進一步的看來和少數的宇宙航空航空航空航航航航航航航航航航航航航航
